name: x-speed
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Speed by one stage. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Raises Speed by one stage in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the stat SPEED during one battle.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the stat SPEED during one battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Raises the SPEED stat of POKéMON in battle. Wears off if the POKéMON is withdrawn.
